title: Basic Electrical Training
description: Learn the fundamentals of electrical systems, wiring, and safety practices.

title: Plumbing Essentials
description: Gain practical knowledge of plumbing tools, pipe systems, and installation techniques.

title: Welding Techniques and Safety
description: Master basic welding processes including MIG, TIG, and ARC with safety training.

title: Housekeeping & Facility Management
description: Learn cleaning protocols, hygiene standards, and equipment handling for hotels and offices.

title: HVAC & AC Repair Training
description: Understand refrigeration, air conditioning systems, and common maintenance techniques.

title: Forklift Operation & Safety
description: Hands-on training on forklift driving, warehouse safety, and material handling procedures.
